column5: gonna put the 12 ft in tommorrow and jig me some fishies. Anyone else had a float yet this year???? I will try real hard to take pics and post!!!!
Still 3 dozen huts on Midland Harbour.. I doubt it !!
sigh................................... Getting my new boat April 30.Until then, takes some pics so i can put them on my desktop and wimper like a girlie boy
APRIL 30th....  I hope to have been fishing a dozen times by then.....
I got out in my boat yesterday... First sunburn of the year... : (

I have no boat, but I have been out fishing in Ottawa.... The water is running to fast for anything by the locks. I went to bait island, not good there, then went to black rapids (i think it is called) and the water is too fast due to the dam, and then drove to Kars Ont. but the ice is still on that part of the Rideau river. So nothing caught yet this year. Maybe next week it might be a little different?  Roy

A few things to do yet, got the motor fixed up yesterday and gave her a test run in a garbage can...ran really nicely considering she's 22 yrs old.  Started rebuilding the transom today, but there's still a lot of ice in front of my place and the Guindon park launch isn't ice free yet...  Mike, did you launch at the RCAF?  Haven't wet a line since my trailer issues last fall so I've got the itch real bad.
x2 for me lol, why sit and cry when you can get out shore fishing at the very least
Bay's still iced up but I'm jonsing to drop it in ... first chance I get!
Yeah...RCAF... I busted the remaining ice with my truck and managed to get my boat in... There isn't much ice flowing in Cornwall but I'd be very careful if you head east...
